snippet: Ahmed Abassi is also accused of seeking to develop a terrorist network in the United States, federal prosecutors said.
abstract: Ahmed Abassi of Tunisia is accused of seeking to develop a terrorist network in the United States and of proposing to poison the water or air to kill up to 100,000 people; pleads not guilty to two counts of making false statements in application to immigration authorities for a green card and a work visa to facilitate an act of international terrorism.
lead_paragraph: Ahmed Abassi is also accused of seeking to develop a terrorist network in the United States, federal prosecutors said.

headline.seo: Tunisian Is Charged With Seeking to Build a Terrorist Network in the U.S.
headline.main: Tunisian Is Accused of Proposing Contamination of Water or Air in U.S.
headline.print_headline: Tunisian Is Accused of Proposing Contamination of Water or Air in U.S.
